column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I waited in the insanely long line (right after they opened
column2: too) and ordered a chocolate chip cookie and the gigantic almond croissant with a tea. The tea was fine. The chocolate chip cookie was gooey and delicious
column3: as it should be. The croissant was--I hate to say it--almost too flakey? I don't know
column5: but it was too messy and although the flavor was good
column6: I think I just prefer what they serve up at French Riviera because it's easier to eat.
